node.text:
I act as Delastraos' lead hunter.
I as with our sisters, keep the surrounding area safe and occasionally indulge in our habits.
Whilst you may presume the local avyrialus pack is viewed as prey: we've been co-existing for half a century.

They're just oversized loves. Large, gentle, and sweet. Pay no mind to their stingers.
I often keep their puffs, and centurylings company and feed. Sharing my milk, and caring for them as though they were my own.

Given all that originated from Dorator has a particularly high life expectancy:
Our youth are divided accordingly: puffs are the youngest ranging between 0-6, and centurylings are as the name suggests.
From that: it takes 900 additional years for us to be considered elders, in spite of our max-age being nearly immortal.

The case of my birth, bears no impact on my sister's protection.
Whilst I may be horned, fanged, silver and scarlet feathered: I am still bonded to her by birth.

My mother found Delastraos in the midst of Dorator's freezing winters when we were puffs.
Of course her being a rinat, and Delastraos being voderai complicated things.

So she as mothers do, she carefully picked her up by the tip of her beak and brought her home.
She sat her next to me, all fluffed and afraid that I as the 5 year of age rinat tried to talk to her.

It didn't take long for Delastraos to talk to me, and for the next 95 years of our youth: we lived our lives as family.
After we matured a fair bit that's when she met Javinex, whom I shouldn't need to trouble you with.

If you insist.
Javinex the youthful devil of the pack father at the time had approached her with a proposal.

They dated for some months before Javinex organised an unprompted wedding.
Some months later, Ansiamia was born and Javinex's demeanor worsened.

After 12 years he began blaming Delastraos for Ansiamia's colouration and lack of horns.
To which I as with a exile of both: Javinex and our pack, helped Delastraos and Ansiamia find safety to which here we are now.
